description:
Installation of rear lightwell with metal grille above and a lower ground floor double glazed window. Installation of soil vent pipe on rear elevation. Installation of air conditioning unit mounted to the rear of the front parapet wall with ceiling cooling distribution at second floor level. Replacement front and rear doors like for like. 

  

Internal alterations including the replacement of internal doors and removal of cornicing and ceiling roses throughout property. At lower ground floor level, removal of existing wc, installation of new wc, creation of utility room, enlarging door openings, painting walls and ceiling and new floor finishes. At ground floor level, partial removal of internal kitchen and dining room wall, chimney breast reveal for hob, removal of panelling and utility meter box, installation of new kitchen and storage. Replacement of first floor bathroom and re-location and replacement of second floor ensuite with rooflight above. 

  

Planning permission and listed building consent are being sought for this proposal. The associated listed building consent reference is P2025/0196/LBC.
